name: Heithem
aboutpara: A self-taught web developer who loves combining the worlds of logic and creative design to make eye-catching, accessible, and user-friendly websites. I am a fast learner with pure love for challenges and lots of motivation, with a passion to learn new technologies.

services.title: Mobile Builder
services.description: We help with the creation and development of your mobile application, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Web Builder
services.description: We help you build you website from scratch.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React,ReactNative Javascript, and most of the Web and Mobile frameworks.

experiences.bullets: I contributed to the AI team by developing innovative AI-driven KYC solutions based on the MCP (Model Contact Protocol). My responsibilities included designing robust systems for validating KYC data to ensure regulatory compliance and fraud prevention. I integrated machine learning models to automate risk detection and improve process efficiency. Working closely with cross-functional teams I deployed real-time applications that significantly enhanced KYC workflows for enterprise-scale environments.

I worked on Vaistat an e-health mobile application focused on facilitating the delivery of medicaments and job placement in the healthcare sector. I implemented features that optimized logistical operations and improved job-matching algorithms. Emphasizing user-centric design I ensured a seamless and intuitive experience tailored for both healthcare providers and patients contributing to the appâ€™s reliability and user engagement.

experiences.position: Web and Mobile Developer at Kayros
experiences.bullets: I played a key role in enhancing the Kayros Wallet application ensuring stability rapid issue resolution and user satisfaction. I implemented comprehensive unit testing for protocol-level communication and expanded language support to 41 languages making the product globally accessible. I integrated Kayros with WalletConnect Explorer to enable seamless DApp connectivity. I introduced PostHog for advanced product analytics including A/B testing heatmaps and feature flags empowering data-driven decision-making.

experiences.position: Web and Mobile Developer at WhiteCape
experiences.bullets: I actively contributed to several web and mobile development projects including the full development lifecycle of two mobile apps. I supervised and mentored three final-year engineering students whose projects all graduated with honors fostering both technical excellence and leadership within the team. My mentorship and guidance during this period contributed to a dynamic and growth-oriented environment.

education.universityPara: Graduated with honors in Computer Science and Multimedia
